channel.title: 3. Create VPC & Subnets :: AWS Intership Report
channel.description: In this component, you will create your own Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) and define two subnets: 1 Public Subnet (Internet accessible) 1 Private Subnet (no direct Internet access) 3.1 Create the VPC Open AWS Management Console Navigate to Services â†’ VPC Click Create VPC Select VPC Only Enter the details: Name tag: Workshop-VPC IPv4 CIDR: 10.0.0.0/16 Keep all other settings at default Click Create VPC
